job.title: Senior Full stack (.NET / Next.js)
job.description:
Role Overview:

As a Full Stack Developer, you will be an integral part of our development team, responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining software solutions. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in .NET and Next.js, with hands-on experience in RabbitMQ, Docker, GraphQL, .NET, Next.JS, SaaS development, and testing methodologies.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Develop and maintain server-side and client-side components.
Implement scalable and high-performance applications.
Work with various technologies, including RabbitMQ, Docker, GraphQL, .NET, and Next.JS.
Contribute to the full software development lifecycle, including planning, development, testing, and deployment.
Ensure code quality, organization, and automatization of tasks.

Requirements:
Experience with https://ui.shadcn.com/
Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer.
Proficiency in .NET and Next.js.
Strong knowledge of RabbitMQ, Docker, GraphQL.
Experience in SaaS development and testing.
Familiarity with basic e-commerce concepts.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment.

questions.question: Describe your recent experience with similar projects
Include a link to your GitHub profile and/or website

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a talented and experienced Senior Full stack developer with expertise in .NET and Next.js to join our team on a long-term basis (more than 6 months). The ideal candidate should be proficient in ASP.NET, Next.js, PostgreSQL, and have experience in SaaS Development.

As a Senior Full stack developer, your main responsibility will be to develop and maintain our web application using .NET and Next.js. You will be involved in the entire software development life cycle, from conception to deployment. You should have a strong understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies and be able to work independently and collaboratively.

To apply for this position, please submit a detailed proposal explaining how you can contribute to the project. Additionally, include links to your past completed projects that highlight your expertise in .NET and Next.js. We are excited to review your application and discuss further details with you.
